definitions.definition: to make liquid usually referring to solid food in a food processor; liquefy .
examples: To make the soup, you should first liquidize the carrots to remove lumps.

definitions.definition: to convert assets into liquid ( cash ) form; to liquidate
examples: The store needs to liquidize its stock so it can pay its creditors.

main_definition: to make liquid usually referring to solid food in a food processor; liquefy .
secondary_definitions: ( business , finance ) to convert assets into liquid ( cash ) form; to liquidate
